title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid email and password credentials and authentication state persists.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input a valid email address and valid password
Submit the registration form
Confirm registration success message is displayed
Confirm user is logged in and authentication state persists across page reload

title: User Registration Failure with Invalid Email
description: Verify registration fails when user inputs an invalid email format and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input an invalid email address and a valid password
Submit the registration form
Confirm error message about invalid email format is displayed

title: User Login Success
description: Verify login is successful using valid email and password and authentication state persists.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid registered user email and password
Click the login button
Confirm user is successfully logged in and redirected to dashboard
Confirm authentication state persists after page reload

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Verify login fails with incorrect password and correct error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid email and incorrect password
Click the login button
Confirm error message about incorrect credentials is displayed

title: Dashboard Display Active Rooms
description: Verify that the dashboard properly displays all active rooms associated with the logged-in user.

steps.description: Log in as a user with existing active rooms
Navigate to the dashboard page
Check all active rooms for the user are listed
Confirm room titles and categories are correctly displayed

title: Create New Room by Category
description: Verify user can create a new matching room by selecting a wedding category and the room is available in dashboard and lobby.

steps.description: Log in as registered user
Navigate to dashboard page
Select option to create a new room
Choose a wedding category from the available list
Confirm room creation
Verify the new room is listed on the dashboard
Verify user is directed to the room lobby and sees a waiting state

title: Join Existing Room with Valid Code
description: Verify that a user can join an existing room using a valid 5-character code and sees the lobby or current session appropriately.

steps.description: Log in as registered user
Navigate to the dashboard page
Select option to join a room
Enter a valid 5-character room code
Confirm join action
Verify user joins room and sees room lobby or session interface

title: Join Existing Room with Invalid Code
description: Verify that joining a room with invalid or non-existent 5-character code shows appropriate error message.

steps.description: Log in as registered user
Navigate to dashboard
Select option to join a room
Enter an invalid or non-existent 5-character code
Attempt to join room
Verify appropriate error message is displayed indicating room not found

title: Room Lobby Waiting until Partner Joins
description: Verify that when a user creates a room and waits in the lobby, appropriate waiting UI is shown until partner joins.

steps.description: User A creates a new room and enters lobby
Verify UI shows waiting message or indicator for partner to join

title: Real-time Sync of Room Session Inputs
description: Verify that swiping and matching decisions made by one user in the room are instantly synchronized and reflected on the partner's screen.

steps.description: User A and User B join the same active room session
User A swipes right on a wedding item
Verify the swipe action is immediately reflected on User B's interface
User B swipes left on another item
Verify the swipe action is immediately reflected on User A's interface

title: Supplier Search Returns Results under 200ms
description: Verify that the supplier search query returns accurate results within 200 milliseconds.

steps.description: Navigate to the supplier search page
Perform a search query with valid parameters
Confirm the search results are displayed within 200 milliseconds
Verify search results match query parameters and contain relevant supplier cards

title: Supplier Search Filters by Category, Location, and Price
description: Verify search filters correctly filter supplier cards by category, location, and price range independently and combined.

steps.description: Navigate to the supplier search page
Apply filter by category only and submit search
Confirm all results match the selected category
Apply filter by location only and submit search
Confirm all results are from the selected location
Apply filter by price range only and submit search
Confirm all results fall within the price range
Apply combined filters for category, location, and price and submit search
Confirm returned results satisfy all combined filter criteria

title: Supplier Cards Display Images, Ratings, and Functional Shortlist Button
description: Verify supplier cards show correct images, ratings, and the shortlist/like button works correctly to add or remove supplier from shortlist.

steps.description: Perform a supplier search returning multiple results
Verify each supplier card displays an image
Verify each supplier card displays the rating
Click the shortlist button on a supplier card
Confirm supplier is added to shortlist and UI updates accordingly
Click the shortlist button again to remove the supplier
Confirm supplier is removed from shortlist and UI updates

title: Shortlisted Suppliers Integrated into Matching Rooms
description: Verify shortlisted suppliers can be seen and are available to be used inside decision-making rooms for collaborative swiping.

steps.description: Shortlist multiple suppliers from the search page
Create or join a matching room
Navigate to the swiping interface inside the room
Verify the shortlisted suppliers appear as swipeable items
